casebody.data:
SKYTOP GARDENS, INC., PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. BOROUGH OF SAYREVILLE, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued January 11, 1983 Decided January 24, 1983.

Before Judges FRITZ and JOELSON.

Ralph Neibart argued the cause on behalf of appellant (David Mandelbaum, of counsel). Alan J. Karcher, Borough Attorney, argued the cause on behalf of respondent. PER CURIAM.

This is an appeal from a judgment of the Tax Court, 3 N.J.Tax 187 “... insofar as said judgment denied discrimination relief for tax years, 1976, 1977 and 1979.” We affirm substantially for the reasons expressed by Judge Andrew in his opinion of August 14, 1981.
